import React from 'react' import '../styles/TourDetails.css' import {Container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const tour = tourData.find((tour) => tour.id === id) const {photo,title,desc,price,reviews,city,distance,maxGroupSize}=tour; return ( <>
) } export default TourDetails
